channel.title: 508 server
channel.description:
i got a few problems
-when i try to login it says error connection to server.(rubikscape) and i used 127.0.0.1 at ip change what can i do
-how do i make myself admin at 508 server it was something with login.java and then with what should i compile ?

item.title: 508 server
item.dc:creator: @King_Lingerz King Lingerz
item.description:
@King_Lingerz wrote:

Making yourself Admin:

Go into login.java and search

           if (p.username.equals("

Then you will see something like

           if (p.username.equals("namehere")) {

where it says namehere on that thing change it to your name, for me it is

           if (p.username.equals("carnage")) {
                p.rights = 2;
            }

To make it easy I just think of it as:

       if players name is carnage 
          they have player rights 2

playerrights 2 is admin btw.

Read full topic
